summary: Employer Portal pages (Dashboard, Advances, Reports, Settings) fully verified. All pages load correctly, UI elements are functional, navigation works seamlessly via sidebar.
passed_tests: Login as employer - testemployer2@eaziwage.com works correctly
Dashboard: All 4 stats cards visible (Total Employees, Total Advances, Pending Advances, Monthly Payroll)
Dashboard: All 4 Quick Actions visible and clickable (Manage Employees, Upload Payroll, View Advances, Reports)
Dashboard: Company Status section shows Verification Status, Industry, Payroll Cycle
Dashboard: Verification in Progress alert displayed for pending employers
Advances page: Title 'Employee Advances' displayed
Advances page: 4 stats cards visible (Total Requests, Disbursed, Pending, Avg Fee Rate)
Advances page: Search input functional
Advances page: Filter buttons (All, Pending, Approved, Disbursed, Rejected) clickable
Advances page: Export Report button visible
Advances page: 'No advances found' message displayed when no data
Advances page: How Advances Work info card displayed
Reports page: Title 'Reports & Analytics' displayed
Reports page: 4 metric cards with change percentages visible
Reports page: Period selector dropdown functional (This Month by default)
Reports page: Download button visible
Reports page: Disbursement by Method section (Mobile Money, Bank Transfer)
Reports page: Employee Breakdown section (Total Enrolled, Active Users, Used Advances, Utilization Rate)
Reports page: Monthly Summary section with metrics
Reports page: Available Reports section with 4 report types (Advances Summary, Employee Report, Financial Report, Payroll Reconciliation)
Settings page: Title 'Settings' displayed
Settings page: 4 tabs visible (Company, EWA Settings, Notifications, Security)
Settings page: Save Changes button visible
Settings Company tab: Company Name input shows 'Test Corp Ltd'
Settings Company tab: Payroll Cycle dropdown shows 'Monthly'
Settings Company tab: Contact Person input shows 'Test Admin'
Settings Company tab: Email Address input shows 'admin@testcorp.com'
Settings Company tab: Phone Number input shows '+254700123456'
Settings Company tab: Verification Status card shows 'Pending'
Settings EWA tab: Maximum Advance Percentage slider shows 50%
Settings EWA tab: Minimum Amount (KES) input shows 500
Settings EWA tab: Maximum Amount (KES) input shows 50000
Settings EWA tab: Access Period From Day dropdown shows 1
Settings EWA tab: Access Period To Day dropdown shows 25
Settings EWA tab: Cooldown Period (Days) input shows 7
Settings EWA tab: EWA Configuration Note card displayed
Settings Notifications tab: 4 toggle switches visible and functional
Settings Notifications tab: Email Notifications, Advance Alerts, Payroll Reminders all ON by default
Settings Notifications tab: Weekly Reports toggle clickable
Settings Security tab: Password change form with 3 fields
Settings Security tab: Update Password button visible
Settings Security tab: Two-Factor Authentication Enable button clickable
Settings Security tab: Login Activity View button clickable
Settings Security tab: API Access Manage button clickable
Sidebar navigation: All 6 links functional (Dashboard, Employees, Payroll, Advances, Reports, Settings)
Sidebar: User info displayed (Test Employer Admin, testemployer2@eaziwage.com)
Sidebar: Sign out button visible
Sidebar: Need Help? contact support section visible
critical_code_review_comments: All pages have proper data-testid attributes for testing
Settings form fields load data from employer API correctly
EWA Settings tab uses slider and dropdown components appropriately
Change percentages in Reports page are hardcoded placeholders (+12.5%, +8.2%, etc.) - this is expected as noted in requirements
context_for_next_testing_agent: Employer portal pages fully tested: Dashboard shows stats and quick actions, Advances page shows advance requests table with filters, Reports page shows analytics with disbursement breakdown and employee stats, Settings page has 4 tabs (Company, EWA, Notifications, Security) with functional form fields and toggles.

tabs.company: Company Name, Payroll Cycle, Contact Person, Email, Phone, Verification Status
tabs.ewa: Max Advance Slider, Min/Max Amount, Access Period dropdowns, Cooldown Period
tabs.notifications: 4 Toggle switches (Email, Advance Alerts, Payroll Reminders, Weekly Reports)
tabs.security: Password change form, 2FA Enable, Login Activity, API Access

notes: Advances data shows 'No advances found' because no employee advances exist in the database. Reports page correctly calculates metrics from available data (all zeros). Change percentages in Reports are hardcoded placeholders as noted in requirements.
